name: HKDiscreteQuantitySample
desc: A sample that represents a discrete quantity.

items.name: var averageQuantity: HKQuantity
items.desc: The average of all quantities contained by the sample.

items.name: var maximumQuantity: HKQuantity
items.desc: The maximum quantity contained by the sample.

items.name: var minimumQuantity: HKQuantity
items.desc: The minimum value contained by the sample.

items.name: var mostRecentQuantity: HKQuantity
items.desc: The most recent quantity contained by the sample.

items.name: var mostRecentQuantityDateInterval: DateInterval
items.desc: The date interval for the most recent quantity contained by the sample.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathMin: String
items.desc: The key path for the sample’s minimum quantity.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathAverage: String
items.desc: The key path for the sample’s average quantity.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathMax: String
items.desc: The key path for the sample’s maximum quantity.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathMostRecent: String
items.desc: The key path for the sample’s most recent quantity.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathMostRecentStartDate: String
items.desc: The key path for the start date of the sample’s most recent quantity.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathMostRecentEndDate: String
items.desc: The key path for the end date of the sample’s most recent quantity.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathMostRecentDuration: String
items.desc: A key path for the duration of the sample’s most recent quantity.
